scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=services/user-service && npm run build --workspace=services/chat-service && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=services/user-service && npm run test --workspace=services/chat-service && npm run test --workspace=frontend
